sentence.Network_en: It is near where the pilgrimage route crosses the road to Quimper.
sentence.Network_cn: 那儿离朝圣之路与通往坎佩尔的道路的交叉路口很近。

sentence.Network_en: His father took him on a sentimental pilgrimage to Ireland.
sentence.Network_cn: 他爸爸带他踏上了去爱尔兰的情感之旅。

sentence.Network_en: The novel " Pilgrimage to the West'shows plenty of imagination.
sentence.Network_cn: 小说《西游记》表现出丰富的想像力.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Provençal pelegrinatge, from pelegrin (see pilgrim)

entry.def: If you make a pilgrimage to a holy place, you go there for a religious reason.
A pilgrimage is a journey that someone makes to a place that is very important to them.

example.tran: 私下前往家族墓地的拜谒

example.ex: His father took him on a sentimental pilgrimage to Ireland.
example.tran: 他爸爸带他踏上了去爱尔兰的情感之旅。

means.word_mean: 1. a journey to a sacred place

auth_sentence.content: On Pilgrimage to Mecca, to Mahomet's Sepulchre.
auth_sentence.res_content: On Pilgrimage to Mecca, to Mahomet's Sepulchre.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On Pilgrimage to Mecca, to Mahomet's Sepulchre.

auth_sentence.content: So consider a converted Cotswold barn for your pilgrimage.
auth_sentence.res_content: So consider a converted Cotswold barn for your pilgrimage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So consider a converted Cotswold barn for your pilgrimage.

auth_sentence.content: Millions make the pilgrimage to the Grand Mosque every year.
auth_sentence.res_content: Millions make the pilgrimage to the Grand Mosque every year.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 名词或动词后缀,表示"状态,总称"; 2. [做的]状态,过程; 3. 名词后缀,表示"费用"; 4. 名词后缀,表示"场所,物品"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dam+age状态,总称→n.损害,伤害
carry携带,运送+age费用→carriage运费
post邮件+age费用→n.邮资
rail铁路+age费用→n.铁路运输,铁路运费
tow拖+age费用→n.拖[船,车]费
water水+age费用→n.水路运输,水运费
anchor铁锚+age场所,物品→n.停泊地点;抛锚地点
append附加+age表示名词→n.附加物
bever饮,喝+age场所,物品→n.[水,酒等之外的]饮料
cot小床,小屋+age场所→cottage村舍,小屋
herit继承+age场所,物品→n.遗产,继承物;传统
hermit隐居士+age场所,物品→n.隐居处
lug拖拉+age物品→需要拖运的物品→luggage行李,皮箱
vill茅屋+age场所,物品→n.村,村庄
wreck残骸+age场所,物品→n.残骸,碎片

stems_affixes.value_cn: 优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad+vant=van前卫,先锋+age状态,总称→n.优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
dot打点,打盹+age状态,总称→n.老年糊涂,溺爱
drain排干+age状态,总称→n.排水;下水道
foli叶+age状态,总称→n.叶子[总称]
marry结婚+age状态,总称→marriage
mile英里+age状态,总称→n.里程
patron赞助人+age状态,总称→n.赞助,惠顾
percent百分比+age状态,总称→n.百分率
pilgrim朝圣+age状态,总称→n.朝圣
short短+age状态,总称→n.不足,缺乏
ton吨+age状态,总称→tonnage吨位
verbi=verb词语+age状态,总称→词的状态→冗长
vis看+age状态,总称→n.脸,面貌
pill抢夺+age状态,总称→n.&v.抢劫,掠夺
en进入+vis看+age[做的]状态→进入看的状态

sentences.en: The shrine was an object of pilgrimage.
sentences.cn: 这处圣地是人们朝圣的目的地。

sentences.en: There was a ban on political protests during the pilgrimage.
sentences.cn: 朝圣期间有禁令禁止举行政治抗议活动。

sentences.en: The novel “Pilgrimage to the West” shows plenty of imagination.
sentences.cn: 小说《西游记》表现出丰富的想像力。
